provisioningState.Description: The provisioningState of the vulnerability assessment capability on the VM

properties.Description: Represents a machines group and set of rules to be allowed running on a machine

location.Description: Location where the resource is stored

enforcementMode.Description: The application control policy enforcement/protection mode of the machine group

protectionMode.Description: The protection mode of the collection/file types. Exe/Msi/Script are used for Windows, Executable is used for Linux.

configurationStatus.Description: The configuration status of the machines group or machine or rule

recommendationStatus.Description: The initial recommendation status of the machine group or machine

sourceSystem.Description: The source type of the machine group

exe.Description: The application control policy enforcement/protection mode of the machine group

msi.Description: The application control policy enforcement/protection mode of the machine group

script.Description: The application control policy enforcement/protection mode of the machine group

executable.Description: The application control policy enforcement/protection mode of the machine group

issue.Description: An alert that machines within a group can have

numberOfVms.Description: The number of machines in the group that have this alert

configurationStatus.Description: The configuration status of the machines group or machine or rule

recommendationAction.Description: The recommendation action of the machine or rule

resourceId.Description: The full resource id of the machine

enforcementSupport.Description: The machine supportability of Enforce feature

path.Description: The full path of the file, or an identifier of the application

action.Description: The recommendation action of the machine or rule

type.Description: The type of the rule to be allowed

publisherInfo.Description: Represents the publisher information of a process/rule

common.Description: Whether the application is commonly run on the machine

fileType.Description: The type of the file (for Linux files - Executable is used)

configurationStatus.Description: The configuration status of the machines group or machine or rule

publisherName.Description: The Subject field of the x.509 certificate used to sign the code, using the following fields -  O = Organization, L = Locality, S = State or Province, and C = Country

productName.Description: The product name taken from the file's version resource

binaryName.Description: The "OriginalName" field taken from the file's version resource

version.Description: The binary file version taken from the file's version resource

username.Description: Represents a user that is recommended to be allowed for a certain rule

recommendationAction.Description: The recommendation action of the machine or rule

location.Description: Location where the resource is stored

provisioningState.Description: Gets the provisioning state of the Just-in-Time policy.

id.Description: Resource ID of the virtual machine that is linked to this policy

ports.Description: Port configurations for the virtual machine

publicIpAddress.Description: Public IP address of the Azure Firewall that is linked to this policy, if applicable

allowedSourceAddressPrefix.Description: Mutually exclusive with the "allowedSourceAddressPrefixes" parameter. Should be an IP address or CIDR, for example "192.168.0.3" or "192.168.0.0/16".

maxRequestAccessDuration.Description: Maximum duration requests can be made for. In ISO 8601 duration format. Minimum 5 minutes, maximum 1 day

startTimeUtc.Description: The start time of the request in UTC

requestor.Description: The identity of the person who made the request

justification.Description: The justification for making the initiate request

id.Description: Resource ID of the virtual machine that is linked to this policy

ports.Description: The ports that were opened for the virtual machine

allowedSourceAddressPrefix.Description: Mutually exclusive with the "allowedSourceAddressPrefixes" parameter. Should be an IP address or CIDR, for example "192.168.0.3" or "192.168.0.0/16".

endTimeUtc.Description: The date & time at which the request ends in UTC

statusReason.Description: A description of why the `status` has its value

mappedPort.Description: The port which is mapped to this port's `number` in the Azure Firewall, if applicable

properties.Description: Describes properties of an assessment metadata.

displayName.Description: User friendly display name of the assessment

policyDefinitionId.Description: Azure resource ID of the policy definition that turns this assessment calculation on

description.Description: Human readable description of the assessment

remediationDescription.Description: Human readable description of what you should do to mitigate this security issue

severity.Description: The severity level of the assessment

userImpact.Description: The user impact of the assessment

implementationEffort.Description: The implementation effort required to remediate this assessment

preview.Description: True if this assessment is in preview release status

assessmentType.Description: BuiltIn if the assessment based on built-in Azure Policy definition, Custom if the assessment based on custom Azure Policy definition

partnerData.Description: Describes the partner that created the assessment

partnerName.Description: Name of the company of the partner

productName.Description: Name of the product of the partner that created the assessment

secret.Description: Secret to authenticate the partner and verify it created the assessment - write only

resourceDetails.Description: Details of the resource that was assessed

displayName.Description: User friendly display name of the assessment

metadata.Description: Describes properties of an assessment metadata.

id.Description: Azure resource Id of the assessed resource

source.Description: The platform where the assessed resource resides

serverName.Description: The Sql server name installed on the machine

databaseName.Description: The Sql database name installed on the machine

workspaceId.Description: Azure resource Id of the workspace the machine is attached to

vmuuid.Description: The unique Id of the machine

sourceComputerId.Description: The oms agent Id installed on the machine

source.Description: The platform where the assessed resource resides

code.Description: Programmatic code for the status of the assessment

cause.Description: Programmatic code for the cause of the assessment status

description.Description: Human readable description of the assessment status

azurePortalUri.Description: Link to assessment in Azure Portal

partnerName.Description: Name of the company of the partner

secret.Description: secret to authenticate the partner - write only

properties.Description: Properties of the Adaptive Network Hardening resource

rules.Description: The security rules which are recommended to be effective on the VM

rulesCalculationTime.Description: The UTC time on which the rules were calculated

effectiveNetworkSecurityGroups.Description: The Network Security Groups effective on the network interfaces of the protected resource

ipAddresses.Description: The remote IP addresses that should be able to communicate with the Azure resource on the rule's destination port and protocol

networkInterface.Description: The Azure resource ID of the network interface

networkSecurityGroups.Description: The Network Security Groups effective on the network interface

properties.Description: Describes the allowed traffic between Azure resources

location.Description: Location where the resource is stored

calculatedDateTime.Description: The UTC time on which the allowed connections resource was calculated

inboundConnectedResources.Description: The list of Azure resources that the resource has inbound allowed connection from

outboundConnectedResources.Description: The list of Azure resources that the resource has outbound allowed connection to

connectedResourceId.Description: The Azure resource id of the connected resource

location.Description: Location where the resource is stored

calculatedDateTime.Description: The UTC time on which the topology was calculated

topologyResources.Description: Azure resources which are part of this topology resource

severity.Description: The security severity of the resource

recommendationsExist.Description: Indicates if the resource has security recommendations

networkZones.Description: Indicates the resource connectivity level to the Internet (InternetFacing, Internal ,etc.)

topologyScore.Description: Score of the resource based on its security severity

parents.Description: Azure resources connected to this resource which are in higher level in the topology view

children.Description: Azure resources connected to this resource which are in lower level in the topology view

resourceId.Description: Azure resource id which serves as parent resource in topology view
Azure resource id which serves as child resource in topology view

location.Description: Location where the resource is stored

securityFamily.Description: The security family of the discovered solution

kind.Description: The kind of the external solution

location.Description: Location where the resource is stored

weight.Description: The relative weight for each subscription. Used when calculating an aggregated secure score for multiple subscriptions.

percentage.Description: Ratio of the current score divided by the maximum. Rounded to 4 digits after the decimal point

location.Description: Location where the resource is stored

securityFamily.Description: The security family of the security solution

alertType.Description: Unique identifier for the detection logic (all alert instances from the same detection logic will have the same alertType).

productComponentName.Description: The name of Azure Security Center pricing tier which powering this alert. Learn more: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/security-center/security-center-pricing

alertDisplayName.Description: The display name of the alert.

description.Description: Description of the suspicious activity that was detected.

severity.Description: The risk level of the threat that was detected. Learn more: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/security-center/security-center-alerts-overview#how-are-alerts-classified.

intent.Description: The kill chain related intent behind the alert. For list of supported values, and explanations of Azure Security Center's supported kill chain intents.

startTimeUtc.Description: The UTC time of the first event or activity included in the alert in ISO8601 format.

endTimeUtc.Description: The UTC time of the last event or activity included in the alert in ISO8601 format.

resourceIdentifiers.Description: The resource identifiers that can be used to direct the alert to the right product exposure group (tenant, workspace, subscription etc.). There can be multiple identifiers of different type per alert.

remediationSteps.Description: Manual action items to take to remediate the alert.

vendorName.Description: The name of the vendor that raises the alert.

status.Description: The life cycle status of the alert.

alertUri.Description: A direct link to the alert page in Azure Portal.

timeGeneratedUtc.Description: The UTC time the alert was generated in ISO8601 format.

productName.Description: The name of the product which published this alert (Azure Security Center, Azure ATP, Microsoft Defender ATP, O365 ATP, and so on).

processingEndTimeUtc.Description: The UTC processing end time of the alert in ISO8601 format.

entities.Description: A list of entities related to the alert.

isIncident.Description: This field determines whether the alert is an incident (a compound grouping of several alerts) or a single alert.

correlationKey.Description: Key for corelating related alerts. Alerts with the same correlation key considered to be related.

compromisedEntity.Description: The display name of the resource most related to this alert.

azureResourceId.Description: ARM resource identifier for the cloud resource being alerted on

type.Description: There can be multiple identifiers of different type per alert, this field specify the identifier type.

workspaceId.Description: The LogAnalytics workspace id that stores this alert.

workspaceSubscriptionId.Description: The azure subscription id for the LogAnalytics workspace storing this alert.

workspaceResourceGroup.Description: The azure resource group for the LogAnalytics workspace storing this alert

agentId.Description: (optional) The LogAnalytics agent id reporting the event that this alert is based on.

type.Description: There can be multiple identifiers of different type per alert, this field specify the identifier type.
